WorkItem.ClosedComment: fix committed for next version, pet dodge was getting higher with more hit instead of lower
WorkItem.Description:
Description: From previous versions of 2.3.0 and earlier, there was requirement if you didn't reach 8% hit rate with talents + hit gear/gem. The ranking of items/enchants that favor "Hit" would be ranked higher in "Overall" DPS. Since 2.3.1 it seems that no matter what I do with it's still saying pure Red gems are higher DPS which is not true if you are not "Hit" cap.
 
Steps To Reproduce:
 
1) Launch Rawr
 
2) Load a Hunter from wowarmory with low hit cap not 8%
 
3) Look at gear being gem for pure Red gems versus "Hit Gems" in yellow slots.
 
4) Compare with 2.3.0 has the correct analysis of how "Hit" should affect DPS.
 
Additional Information;
Rawr v2.3.1 Only
WorkItem.Summary: [Hunter] Hunter Hit Cap No Longer Required

Comments.Message: To clarify, there was never a "requirement" where if you were less than 8% hit something would force it to be your Top DPS, the data just migrates to that. I have noticed what you mention in that Hit has gone down in value with recent commits but I'm not entirely certain that it's actually a bug.

It is a bug, unless every other hunter dps simulation tool out there is wrong.

Rawr doesn't only tell me that agi gems are better when well under the hit cap, it also prefers crit to hit. Sorry, but this is not correct. For hunters, hit > all when under the cap.
